de.freinsberg.pomecaloco

Class MyTrackSpinnerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Pair<java.lang.String,byte[]>>
        • de.freinsberg.pomecaloco.MyTrackSpinnerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class MyTrackSpinnerAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Pair<java.lang.String,byte[]>>
    This class represents an adapter for a spinner. It is used to fill trackname according to their picture next to each other into a row of the spinner.
    Author:
    freinsberg

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyTrackSpinnerAdapter

        public MyTrackSpinnerAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                     int textViewResourceId,
                     java.util.List<Pair<java.lang.String,byte[]>> objects)
        Constructor: Creates an adapter with the given params.
        Parameters:
        context - The context where the adapter is used.
        textViewResourceId - The resourceid of the layout file that represents the row in the spinner.
        objects - This is a list of Pairs, including String and byte[], representing the trackname and a picture.

      • getPosition

        public int getPosition(java.lang.String preselectedTrack)
        This method gets the position of a given track.
        Parameters:
        preselectedTrack - The track for which the position is needed.
        Returns:
        The position as an interger representative or -1 if something goes wrong.
